formattedAddress: 447 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 447 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA

editorialSummary.text: Quaint, long-running flower shop selling bouquets,  arrangements, gifts & plants.

originalText.text: Q Florist did our floral arrangements for our August wedding at Saltwater Farm Vineyard and absolutely crushed it.  Our family and friends have not stopped talking about how beautiful the arrangements were - the head table and the ceremony arch were absolute show stoppers. The arch was completely custom and built exactly how we wanted it from an inspo photo. They were incredible to work with, kept us engaged and involved through the entire design project, and delivered absolutely unreal results. The photos speak for themselves. We're so grateful, but not at all surprised, by the amazing job done by our friends at Q!!

text.text: Q Florist did our floral arrangements for our August wedding at Saltwater Farm Vineyard and absolutely crushed it.  Our family and friends have not stopped talking about how beautiful the arrangements were - the head table and the ceremony arch were absolute show stoppers. The arch was completely custom and built exactly how we wanted it from an inspo photo. They were incredible to work with, kept us engaged and involved through the entire design project, and delivered absolutely unreal results. The photos speak for themselves. We're so grateful, but not at all surprised, by the amazing job done by our friends at Q!!

originalText.text:
Our experience with Q Florist was nothing short of magical! Planning a wedding can be a daunting task, but the team turned our floral dreams into a breathtaking reality.

The bouquet they crafted for our big day was a true work of art. The meticulous attention to detail and the exquisite combination of flowers left us speechless. It was not just a bouquet; it was a masterpiece that perfectly complemented the elegance of the occasion. The flowers were fresh, vibrant, and carefully arranged, making it stunning!

The church flower arrangement was divine. The floral designs were tasteful, and the colors matched our theme seamlessly. It truly set the tone for a romantic and joyous ceremony.

The table centerpieces were a showstopper. Each table was adorned with unique arrangements that added a touch of sophistication to the reception venue. Our guests continue to rave about the creativity and beauty of the centerpieces after the wedding. It created a warm and inviting atmosphere, making our celebration even more memorable.

The wedding party flowers were equally impressive. The bridesmaids' bouquets and the boutonnieres for the groomsmen were carefully crafted to complement the overall theme. The flowers were also durable, lasting throughout the day without wilting.

This store had exceptional customer service. The team was attentive, accommodating, and truly invested in making our day extraordinary. They listened to our ideas, offered valuable suggestions, and worked tirelessly to bring our vision to life.

Overall, Q Florist exceeded our expectations in every aspect. Their passion for floral artistry and commitment to customer satisfaction truly made our wedding day one for the books. If you're looking for a floral partner who will turn your dreams into reality, look no further - Our deepest gratitude to the entire team for making our special day a blooming success!

originalText.text: Diane was quite surprised and pleasantly so. The colors and arrangement were definitely her style. She said she "loved" it.

text.text: Diane was quite surprised and pleasantly so. The colors and arrangement were definitely her style. She said she "loved" it.

originalText.text: I recently used Q Florist for my beautiful Bridal Shower. My friends and family are still raving about the florals. Costa went above and beyond to make sure he fulfilled the aesthetic that I was describing, and was extremely communicative throughout the entire process. His expertise was invaluable, and the flowers were fresh and fragrant. I wouldn't think twice about using any other florist for an event in the future.

Costa went above and beyond to make sure he fulfilled the aesthetic that I was describing, and was extremely communicative throughout the entire process. originalText.text: Costa at Q florist has amazing talent. I had the pleasure of working with this florist shop to create the center pieces, dessert table arrangements, flower accents for my grass wall, flowers for my cake, and a bouquet. The entire experience working with this florist shop was excellent. Costa, the owner is super knowledgeable and helped make my vision come to life and made it even more beautiful than I imagined it. I also liked that he maintained open communication with me throughout the entire planning process and we used a shared google doc to share pictures and ideas. Costa Delivered the flowers to my venue in Woodbury Long Island and set everything up a few hours before the event. All the flowers were super fresh and lively. The attention to detail for each arrangement was impressive. My guests and I were blown away by his beautiful work. I will be using this shop for all my events in the future!
